  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationUtilities
    Created by pmacdowell on 8/16/2016.
    AppLockdownUtils
    This class is used for locking down an application for COSU (Company-owned Single Use): https://developer.android.com/work/cosu.html This class requires a device admin receiver to function properly as well as some changes to the manifest, xml, and commands via the adb.
    BoolUtilities
    Created by pmacdowell on 2017-08-25.
    CameraMediaUtilities
    Note! If you are using the cropping option, you must include the UCrop dependency and activity in your project, https://github.com/Yalantis/uCrop.

    Flags and options class for specific things to happen within the Camera Utilities calls
